sellerCard.oneLiner: Seeking and Solving Challenges with Code

description.content:
Hi there,


Need a simple and affordable website for your business or personal blog? You don't need a traditional dynamic website with loads of unnecessary functionality which makes your site slower and heavier. You can just get a static website without any database and stuff but still customizable.


With my years of experience and skills, I can help you to design and develop that.



The advantages of static sites are:


  • Fast loading
  • Seo friendly
  • Lightweight
  • Improved security
  • Low cost
  • Easier to deploy
  • More scalable


Overall, static websites are a good choice for small businesses, personal portfolios, and simple blogs that do not require frequent updates or complex user interactions.




List of static site generators I work with:


  • Eleventy
  • Jekyll
  • Astro
  • Gridsome
  • Hugo
  • Next.js
  • Jekyll




Finally, if any of these benefits appeal to you, a static website might be the right choice for your business.


So to start if you have any doubts or questions just leave me a message, I am always here to help you.




Note: Please discuss the project with me before placing an order to get a better solution in the shortest time...

 

and then PLACE AN ORDER.



 

Thank You

and peace :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide full stack development with backend?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I don't provide backend development service. I specialize in front-end development and front-end logic. I can also integrate API data sources into websites but for that, I will require thorough giue and discussion about the logic.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are your package prices fixed? Do you work with custom offer?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, these package prices are not fixed. And yes I work with custom offers. Most of my orders are with custom offers. We will discuss your requirements in texts or meetings (if needed) and then I will suggest the best package based on your needs with the best price and time.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide exclusive/premium assets like images, videos, fonts?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No. I don't provide exclusive images, videos, or fonts. If you want I can use free images and fonts. But if you want to use any premium image, video, or font then you have to purchase that and provide them to me. I can then use them in design where needed.

packageList.title: Silver
packageList.description: Lightweight static website with customize able content sections (max 3 page template)

packageList.title: Gold
packageList.description: Fast, lightweight static website with customize able content sections and blog (max 5 page template)

packageList.title: Platinum
packageList.description: Fast, lightweight, seo friendly static website with blog, customize able style and content sections.
